name: Dayspa
description: A luxurious establishment offering relaxation and beauty treatments; adventurers can indulge in pampering, meet wealthy clients, or recover from their adventures in comfort.
atmosphere: The spa is filled with the soothing scent of essential oils and the gentle sound of flowing water. The air carries the promise of relaxation and luxury, while soft music and the murmur of quiet conversation creates a peaceful, indulgent atmosphere. The space feels removed from the outside world, a sanctuary of comfort and pampering.
